title: Strengthening e-learning practical competencies: Science teacher education design and reflection using metadata tagging

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced-level specialized knowledge in the field and extensive practical experience
context.additional_context: Competency enhancement program for professionals in education/teaching/learning fields

learning_goals: Learners can systematically tag five weeks of educational activities using metadata categories (e.g., learning objectives, activity types, assessment methods) when designing science lessons
Learners can objectively evaluate and reflect on their instructional design patterns (e.g., activity type distribution, difficulty progression) by analyzing generated visualizations
Learners can recognize and improve implicit intentions embedded in their instructional designs (e.g., concept emphasis sequence, student engagement strategies) through comparison with peer teachers
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
